oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Court Square with Bust and Fountain
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: “Court Square, Memphis, Tenn. -- Irene Papa is much Better How are you all EB 808/07 [handwritten]” Color image with bust at the forefront, fountain further back.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Court Square; parks; downtown;
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: The Rotograph Co., N. Y. City
